channel.title: Redmi K70E MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater
channel.description: Your best website to track MIUI ROM releases!

image.title: Redmi K70E MIUI Updates Tracker by XiaomiFirmwareUpdater

item.title: MIUI OS1.0.8.0.UNLCNXM Recovery update for Redmi K70E China
item.description:
New Stable Recovery update available!

Device: Redmi K70E China

Codename: duchamp

Version: OS1.0.8.0.UNLCNXM | 14.0

Size: 6.4 GB

MD5: 9062417d30ca4285f06fa91efba4aefe

Changelog:
[Highlights]
Optimization: System stability
Optimization: Touch controls in some scenarios
Fix: Call errors occurred in some cases
Fix: Games weren't responsive in some cases
Fix: Icons weren't shown correctly in WeChat Pay version 8.0.44
Fix: WLAN connection stability in some scenarios
Fix: Issues with gesture controls in Tencent Video while charging
Fix: The screen flashed in some cases
Fix: Weibo froze while rendering scrolling in some cases
[System]
Updated Android Security Patch to December 2023. Increased system security.
[Floating windows]
Optimization: Display and performance improvements for floating windows
[Proactive intelligence]
New: Advanced AI technologies allow devices to assist you proactively (Beta)
New: Deep integration of large AI models empowers system apps
[Camera]
Fix: Known Camera issues

Download: Here

Incremental Update: Here
